_sText:
This map was made by me. The idea came from when I was playing in a Pub which the maps were all MiniGame type, and I LOVED IT! so I've come with this one. Rules: Terrors. Kill all the CTs before the time is up. Counter Terrors. Escape from the terrorists in order to survive for a minute. Then Terrors will automaticly die. The glass plataforms will individualy break in 10 secs after a player hits it (Any player) .
Have Fun playing this map.
Thanks to Solid Snake who gave me the idea. He may not know. but he did =) The name of this map has a reason. This map cost me all my saturday :|
